info.name: Furry Network Theme
info.description:
Currently changes the website theme to be green and makes the cursor into a green pawprint, future versions will allow custom set colors and will provide more cursors.
Use http://www.color-hex.com/ to find the rgb value.
Message if you find a bug or have a suggestion @ http://www.furaffinity.net/user/xdelta/ or https://beta.furrynetwork.com/delta/
info.additionalInfo:
[releases]
+[1.2]
-Adjusted explicit badge
-Fixed landing page button color 
-Custom color choices
-Ability to use a pawprint cursor
+[1.1]
-Sign-up button fixed
-Colored for new badges
-Fixed landing page color
+[1.0]
-Initial release

[planned]
change the color on svg logo
color last of the badges

[bugs]

data.title: Not bad, decent if you want something different
